Summary: Rows of red & white lights not blinking traveling from the north to east.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around July 4th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife & I were in our bedroom looking out at the fireworks and saw 2 groups of lights in a triangular formation traveling from the North then turning to the east. Then they just disappeared then we saw a row of more lights I would say it was about 15-20 crafts heading in the same direction, this lasted for about 20 minutes and we watched from our bedroom window at one point I saw a group of 5-6 craft form a odd shape triangle shape . These were not fireworks they were some sort of aircraft. I have 110 hours in the air,studied aviation and these where not planes or helicopters as the lights were not flashing(blinking wing lights-red or green). And you can see that its was a line of craft coming from the North. Which I thought was strange for that time of night and if they were military jets you can usually hear the noise.
